title: Writing md file note for branch

revert.diff:
diff --git a/BRANCH_NOTES.md b/BRANCH_NOTES.md
deleted file mode 100644
index c00286b..0000000
--- a/BRANCH_NOTES.md
+++ /dev/null
@@ -1,90 +0,0 @@
-# Main Branch Notes - November 2025
-
-## Recent Changes Overview
-
-This branch contains several important fixes and improvements focused on UI performance, memory management, and terminal handling.
-
-### Key Fixes
-
-#### 1. Production React Builds (PR #615)
-
-- **Issue**: Performance buffer overflow in development React builds
-- **Solution**: Enabled production React builds to prevent performance issues
-- **Files**: `esbuild.config.js`, build configurations
-- **Impact**: Improved performance and stability
-
-#### 2. Memory Leak in SettingsDialog (PR #607)
-
-- **Issue**: Memory leak in SettingsDialog component
-- **Solution**: Fixed memory management in dialog components
-- **Files**: `packages/cli/src/ui/components/SettingsDialog.tsx`, related test files
-- **Impact**: Reduced memory usage and improved component lifecycle management
-
-#### 3. Terminal Raw Mode Fix (Issue #263)
-
-- **Issue**: Terminal sequences and raw mode not properly restored after tmux reattach
-- **Solution**: Re-enabled raw mode and terminal sequences restoration
-- **Files**: `packages/cli/src/ui/utils/terminalSequences.ts`, `packages/cli/src/ui/contexts/KeypressContext.tsx`
-- **Impact**: Better terminal experience, especially in tmux environments
-
-#### 4. Dialog Key Handling Improvements
-
-- **Enhancement**: Better key event handling in dialog components
-- **Files**: Multiple dialog components in `packages/cli/src/ui/components/`
-- **Impact**: Improved user interaction with dialogs
-
-### Technical Improvements
-
-#### UI Component Enhancements
-
-- Updated multiple dialog components for better performance:
-  - `LoadProfileDialog.tsx`
-  - `LoggingDialog.tsx`
-  - `ProviderDialog.tsx`
-  - `ProviderModelDialog.tsx`
-  - `ToolsDialog.tsx`
-
-#### Test Infrastructure
-
-- Added try/finally blocks to test cleanup for better resource management
-- Enhanced test coverage for UI components and key handling
-
-#### Dependencies
-
-- Updated package dependencies across CLI and core packages
-- Synchronized package-lock.json for consistency
-
-### Testing & Quality
-
-- All changes include corresponding test updates
-- Improved test reliability with better cleanup procedures
-- Enhanced type safety in UI components
-
-## Current Status
-
-The branch is stable and includes:
-
-- ✅ Performance improvements
-- ✅ Memory leak fixes
-- ✅ Terminal handling enhancements
-- ✅ Better user experience in dialog interactions
-- ✅ Comprehensive test coverage
-
-## Next Steps
-
-These fixes prepare the codebase for:
-
-1. Better performance in production environments
-2. More reliable terminal interactions
-3. Enhanced user experience
-4. Stronger foundation for future UI improvements
-
-## Verification
-
-To verify these changes work correctly:
-
-1. Run `npm run build` - should complete without errors
-2. Test dialog interactions in the CLI
-3. Verify terminal behavior in tmux sessions
-4. Check memory usage during extended sessions
-5. Run the full test suite to ensure no regressions
